sentences.sContent: A herd of antelopes, asses, buffalos, caribou, deer, elephants, elk, giraffes, harts, horses, ibex, moose, seals, sheep, walruses, whales, zebras.
sentences.sContent_eng: A herd of antelopes, asses, buffalos, caribou, deer, elephants, elk, giraffes, harts, horses, ibex, moose, seals, sheep, walruses, whales, zebras.
sentences.sCn: 一群羚羊，驴，野牛，驯鹿，鹿，大象，麋鹿，长颈鹿，雄鹿，马，野山羊，驼鹿，海豹，山羊，海象，鲸鱼，斑马。

sentences.sContent: In the Canadian Yukon, scientists are using genetic techniques to identify caribou and to study ancient caribou that roamed the same ice patches 6,000 years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the Canadian Yukon, scientists are using genetic techniques to identify caribou and to study ancient caribou that roamed the same ice patches 6,000 years ago.
sentences.sCn: 在加拿大的育空地区，科学家们正在利用基因技术来鉴别北美驯鹿，并探究古时驯鹿的相关信息，6000年前它们曾在这块流冰区漫步。
